challenge.title: Beatriz Lafferriere - Introduction to Mathematical Analysis I - Chapter 1
challenge.description: Beatriz Lafferriere, Gerardo Lafferriere, and Mau Nam Nguyen's Introduction to Mathematical Analysis I is an introduction to Real Analysis.
challenge.instructions: Read Dr. Lafferriere's Introduction to Mathematical Analysis I Chapter One and complete all problems with provided solutions.
